name: mosh-perl
description: mosh-perl is a mobile shell that allows roaming, supports intermittent connectivity, and provides intelligent local echo and line editing.
usage: After installing mosh-perl, you can start a mosh session by typing: mosh user@hostname
features: Mobile Shell: Allows roaming and supports intermittent connectivity.
Local Echo: Provides intelligent local echo and line editing.
